swe029 wrote:

> I'm wondering if this is happening because the method that generates 
> the exception also catches it and hence JUnit can't find the 
> exception?

It can't, and it shouldn't. After all, the method that is called by the 
test doesn't throw the exception.

Cheers, Ilja
